verses.name: Luke 12:52
verses.text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided, three against two, and two against three.

verses.name: Luke 12:53
verses.text: The father shall be divided against the son, and the son against the father; the mother against the daughter, and the daughter against the mother; the mother in law against her daughter in law, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.

verses.name: Luke 12:54
verses.text: And he said also to the people, When ye see a cloud rise out of the west, straightway ye say, There cometh a shower; and so it is.
